This chart gives us the sense of number of days the server was on during our period of observation. Each bar corresponds to a school and we have number of days on y-axis. Hover on the graph to access more tools. click here to know more

Total number of days the server was switched ON during the observation period (June 2018 - Dec 2018)



DISCLAIMER:

*The server usage metrics only indicate the extent of server machine usage and do not indicate what application in the server was being used.
